mapper.insert: insert into hosinsa_cart(cartnum,proimg,pronum,id,quantity,price,proname) values (SEQ_CART.nextval, (select proimg from hosinsa_product where pronum = #{pronum}) ,#{pronum},#{id},#{quantity}, (select price from hosinsa_product where pronum = #{pronum}), (select proname from hosinsa_product where pronum = #{pronum}))
mapper.update: update hosinsa_cart set quantity = quantity +1 where cartnum = #{cartnum}
update hosinsa_cart set quantity = quantity -1 where cartnum = #{cartnum}
mapper.select: select count(*) from hosinsa_cart where pronum = #{pronum} and id = #{id}
mapper.update: update hosinsa_cart set quantity = quantity + #{quantity} where pronum = #{pronum} and id = #{id}
